DOC.brief_title: Dietary Manipulation Human Milk Total Fat Caloric Content Feasible ?
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study verify whether dietary manipulation lactate woman allow increase fat caloric content human milk . specifically , test follow hypotheses:1 ) constant caloric intake , 2 high fat ( 40 % fat , 45 % CHO ) diet ( margarine e nriched versus butter enrich ) lead high fat caloric content human milk low fat diet ( 5 % fat , 80 % CHO ) ; 2 ) All 3 group strikingly different milk fatty acid profile ( mirror dietary fatty acid profile ) .
DOC.criteria: breast feed woman healthy medication woman medication
